SELECT eha.sys_id, eha.creation_time -- 企业服务预约记录 FROM entity_healthy_appointment eha WHERE 1 = 1 AND eha.status = 3 AND eha.service_option = 1 AND eha.is_cancelled = 0 AND eha.is_deleted = 0 AND eha.pkg_main_id = 8 AND eha.pkg_detail_id = 801
AND eha.user_id = #{params.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(eha.creation_time , '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y')
AND DATE_FORMAT(eha.creation_time , '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY eha.creation_time ASC

select eha.user_id, ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, se.entity_name, eed.effect_to, ub.is_hr, eha.order_no, se.entity_id from entity_healthy_appointment as eha LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=eha.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity as se ON se.entity_id=eha.entity_no LEFT JOIN entity_exclusive_doctor as eed ON eed.doctor_no=eha.related_no
where eha.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and eha.status=1

eha.order_no=#{orderNo}
